title: Can't connect until 5-10 min into game? (Since 5.20)
body:
HELP! after 5.20 i have been very laggy in the client, when click on profile or leagues ect. Then champ select is fine and when game starts i get a black screen . After a while i receive a notice that there is a connection issue and to check my network connection. My connection is fine.  after about 5-10 minutes of exiting the game reloading, and trying to reconnect several times, the game lets me in. Also when i select a champion in champ select it gives me a brief "Retrieving data from server"

I found a post about flushing the DNS which hasn't really worked ether. I can still go on the inter net (Skype and Curse are working). I am also still able to browse the internet but cant seem to get into game until 5-10 minutes in.

Is anyone else experiencing this?

PLEASE HELP{{item:3070}}

replies.body: Riot has an awesome Connection KB that fixed that issue for me if you wanna give that a try: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues I'll be on for a bit Leagueing it up, so if it doesn't work feel free to reach out to me. :D {{champion:25}} {{summoner:6}} {{item:1026}}
